headline: Newmont Challenges Barrick On Nevada Venture And Potential IPO Value
summary: Newmont (NYSE:NEM) is pressing Barrick Mining to improve operational performance at their Nevada Gold Mines joint venture. The company is signaling it may use protective clauses in the joint venture agreement to challenge or block Barrick's planned asset IPO. Newmont has publicly raised concerns about deteriorating results at Nevada Gold Mines under Barrick's operatorship. The dispute could influence how any Nevada Gold Mines spinoff or sale is structured and how investors assess the...
